oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ma Perkins - 1948-11-23
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS radio program Ma Perkins, originally broadcast 1948-11-23. Featuring actor Virginia Payne with announcer 'Charlie Warren' (possibly Dan Donaldson or Marvin Miller). Sponsored by Oxydol.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Charlie Warren) -- Oxydol commercial (Charlie Warren) -- Ma Perkins introduction (Charlie Warren) -- Ma Perkins episode -- Oxydol commercial (Charlie Warren) -- Closing statement (Charlie Warren)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; WNOX (Radio station : Knoxville, Tenn.); Ma Perkins (Radio program); Payne, Virginia; Campbell, Kay, 1904-1985; Forbes, Murray, 1906-1987
